FuncDef:
The ds-lite traffic-class command sets the traffic class for IPv6 packets transmitted on a DS-Lite tunnel.
The undo ds-lite traffic-class command restores the default traffic class for IPv6 packets transmitted on a DS-Lite tunnel.
By default, the IPv4 traffic class is copied to the IPv6 traffic class field before the IPv6 packets are transmitted on a DS-Lite tunnel.

ParaDef.Info:
Sets the traffic class of IPv6 packets that are sent to a DS-Lite tunnel.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 255.

ExtraInfo:
When user traffic is sent from the network side to the user side through a DS-Lite tunnel, run the ds-lite traffic-class command to set the traffic class for IPv6 packets transmitted on a DS-Lite tunnel.
The traffic class indicates the Traffic Class field in the header of IPv6 packets that the inbound interface on a DS-Lite tunnel receives.
